relation: Winter month offering mild climate. Days are pleasant with beautiful sunshine while nights are moderately cold. It is one of the perfect months for taking up holiday package and enjoying the best of Chittorgarh. Excellent time for sightseeing and outdoor activities.

Temperature starts to rise as March enters. The weather becomes warm but still comfortable for taking up tourist activities. Sightseeing and indoor activities as well as other tourist related activities can be indulged.

The glorious city of Chittorgarh experiences very hot climate in summer. The weather becomes hot in April making it uncomfortable for indulging in tourist activities. Due to hot weather most tourists avoid visiting the place in this month. If visiting, make sure you carry proper sun gear.

The place receives drizzle with an average 18 days. Temperature reduces to some extent while the humidity level increases. This period is ideal for enjoying the pleasure of rain. Besides, hotels as well as tour packages rates are also lower as compared to peak months.

August is recorded with highest rainfall in the year. Due to drizzle, the temperature falls down and becomes quite comfortable. It is an ideal month for rain enthusiast to visit the place and enjoy the delight of rain.
